scripts.android: cp firebase-dev/google-services.json android/app/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-android --variant=debug
scripts.android-solo: cp firebase-dev/google-services.json android/app/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.android-solo-qa: cp firebase-dev/google-services.json android/app/google-services.json && ENVFILE=.env.staging react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.android-win: cp firebase-dev\google-services.json android\app\google-services.json && SET ENVFILE = '.env.development' && react-native run-android --variant=debug
scripts.ios: touch ios/MyFMSApp/Info.plist && cp firebase-dev/GoogleService-Info.plist ios/GoogleService-Info.plist && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios
scripts.ios-device: touch ios/MyFMSApp/Info.plist && cp firebase-dev/GoogleService-Info.plist ios/GoogleService-Info.plist && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios --device
scripts.ios-solo: touch ios/MyFMSApp/Info.plist && cp firebase-dev/GoogleService-Info.plist ios/GoogleService-Info.plist && ENVFILE=.env.development react-native run-ios --device --configuration Release
scripts.ios-solo-qa: touch ios/MyFMSApp/Info.plist && cp firebase-dev/GoogleService-Info.plist ios/GoogleService-Info.plist && ENVFILE=.env.staging react-native run-ios --device --configuration Release
